HOW TO PLAY!
Presented with a odd matrix, drag number from below presented number and drop it into the matrix, you need to fill the non-repeating numbers in the matrix. Each line horizontally / vertically should add up to n (sqr (n) +1) / 2. On filling the numbers correctly in the matrix with in the limited time you win the game.
Example: In 3 x 3 matrix ,fill numbers 1 - 9 in each box. Each line of the matrix both horizontally/Vertically should add up to 3 ( 9 + 1) /2 = 15.
